legacy.description: official twitter account of Embassy of China in the Kingdom of Netherlands
legacy.name: Embassy of China in the Netherlands

legacy.full_text:
President Xi Jinping and his wife exchanged congratulatory messages with Dutch royal family on birth of #panda cub 🐼 ❤️

They said, the new life is a beautiful fruit of Sino-Dutch friendship and an important achievement in bilateral cooperation on biodiversity conservation. https://t.co/Ly2sbvnFOl

Today is #DragonBoatFestival. To celebrate the festival, Chinese people eat #Zongzi, and race dragon-shaped boats. It’s also the day when people send best wishes to each other. Wish everyone good health and well-being! 

Do you like this version of Het meisje met de parel? 😝 https://t.co/lxNxCJtsSu

legacy.full_text:
In a phone call with Dutch FM Mr. Blok, State Councillor Mr. Wang Yi said: 

🇨🇳 willing to deepen bilateral relations in fighting covid-19,  the two sides could discuss setting up a fast lane for essential travel.

🇨🇳 glad to see a more positive role of 🇳🇱 in China-EU relations. https://t.co/WwbzQ20Enf

legacy.description: official twitter account of Embassy of China in the Kingdom of Netherlands
legacy.name: Embassy of China in the Netherlands

legacy.full_text:
Glad to meet you🤗 This is the official twitter account of Chinese Embassy in the Netherlands. 

We're committed to promoting🇨🇳🇳🇱relations and mutual understanding between the two peoples. 

Follow us for more updates of true stories of China & friendly bilateral relations! https://t.co/dRg3cIRMKP

user_mentions.name: Embassy of China in the Netherlands

legacy.full_text:
Glad to introduce the new official twitter account of our embassy in the Hague!🇨🇳🇳🇱 

Follow @ChinaEmbNL to see the latest development on China-Dutch relations, first-hand release of embassy notice&comment, and breaking news from China.

legacy.full_text:

legacy.full_text:
Hong Kong society and officials voice support for a draft law on safeguarding national security in HKSAR.

The legislation will effectively crack down on violence, bring back peaceful lives to Hong Kong residents, and push the economy back on track. 

See👉https://t.co/JVxfeT72k6

HK national security law draft first reading completed! 

Central government will establish a commissioner's office for national security affairs in HK. HK government will set up a special commission chaired by chief executive for national security. 
https://t.co/5UxUyOotwq

China's top legislature on Sat condemned the EU's latest resolution, which makes unwarranted criticism against the national security legislation in #HongKong. https://t.co/4vSRVlW7fm https://t.co/70sBNM9yft

No countries in the world, including those in Europe, would allow for any legal gaps in terms of national security. The NPC's decision is a necessary step to fill in a legislative gap in HK. Applying double standards to interfere China's internal affairs would be strongly opposed
RT @FuCong17: China to join the #ArmsTradeTreaty! Standing Committee of the National People's Congress just ratified! This testifies to Chi…

China to join the #ArmsTradeTreaty! Standing Committee of the National People's Congress just ratified! This testifies to China's commitment to multilateralism and to building a community with a shared future for mankind.@INakamitsu @Amb_LiSong https://t.co/lBZsombi0b

legacy.description: Official account of the Secretariat of the @UN Human Rights Council | Compte officiel du Secrétariat du Conseil des droits de l’homme de l’@ONU_fr.
legacy.name: United Nations Human Rights Council

legacy.full_text: #HRC43 adopts by consensus res. strongly condemning racially discriminatory & violent practices perpetrated by law enforcement against Africans & people of African descent & excessive use of force against #PeacefulProtests & calls on States to cooperate w/ preparation of report.

Some countries should really reflect on itself about the root causes of systematic racial discrimination and truly protect the human rights of their own people instead of using human rights as a political tool to interfere in other countries' internal affairs.

legacy.description:
Follow us to know more about China's Diplomacy. 
YouTube https://t.co/owWGn7pWzE 
Facebook https://t.co/Mkd9zD52cs 
Instagram https://t.co/Ibatpyiyli
legacy.name: Spokesperson发言人办公室

legacy.full_text: We strongly oppose random accusations on Hong Kong affairs in the G7 statement. Hong Kong affairs are China’s internal affairs that allow no foreign interference. We urge relevant sides to read through the Constitution and Hong Kong Basic Law & view the legislation objectively. https://t.co/t8tMK5adaI

China is an independent sovereign state of which HK is an integral part. Any attempt to challenge China's sovereign right to safeguard it's national security in HK is a severe violation of international law and must be rejected by Chinese people.

Minsters agreed to work towards a Health Silk Road, and to enhance connectivity, economic recovery and practical cooperation.

BRI partners have the responsibility and the obligation to set an example.
